definition: with a grunting sound it stops (idiom); to come to an end spontaneously (esp. of sound)
covered in dust/dusty/lying unused for a long time
to stay somewhere temporarily/to stop over
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
the curtain drops/the end of the show
eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
